name: Anabasis
description:
Anabasis is a game based on the myth of Orpheus and Eurydice.

As Orpheus, you want to take your beloved Eurydice out of the Hades, but to do so you'll have to clear your way through waves of monsters playing your lyre.

To learn more about this story:

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Orpheus_and_Eurydice

Controls

all controls for controller are intended for X360 controller

movement left-right:

keyboard: A,D or left arrow key-right arrow key

controller: left-right Dpad

jump:

keyboard: W or up arrow key

controller: up Dpad

take her hand:

keyboard: S or down arrow key

controller: down Dpad

fight monsters:

keyboard: left and right mouse button

controller: A and B button
